subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Michigan defensive end Frank Clark was dismissed from the team Monday, the same day he pleaded not guilty to assault and domestic-violence charges after being accused of beating a woman at an Ohio hotel over the weekend.
snippet: Michigan defensive end Frank Clark was dismissed from the team Monday, the same day he pleaded not guilty to assault and domestic-violence charges after being accused of beating a woman at an Ohio hotel over the weekend.
